rules_text:
Rhapsody {4}{W}{W} [i](Pay {4}{W}{W} to cast this as a 4/4, or as a sorcery to make it become a 4/4.)[/i]
Triumvirate Strategist has first strike as long as it's attacking.
flavor_text: [i]“Today's tactics don't have the same soul, I liked the old ones far more.”[/i]
notes: Old Time Rock & Roll — Bob Seger & The Silver Bullet Band
